IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO CHANGE LIVES THROUGH CHALLENGE AND DISCOVERY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO CHANGE LIVES THROUGH CHALLENGE AND DISCOVERY.
IRS990.Desc: THE SCHOOL CONTINUED TO BUILD BACK PROGRAM REVENUE AND ITS STAFFING POOL IN 2022. OPEN ENROLLMENT COURSES SERVED 434 STUDENTS WITH 5,694 PARTICIPATION DAYS. GROUP EDUCATION PROGRAMS SERVED 1,214 STUDENTS WITH 4,479 PARTICIPATION DAYS. VETERANS PROGRAMS SERVED 106 STUDENTS WTIH 596 PARTICIPATION DAYS. OUTWARD BOUND PROFESSIONAL PROGRAMS SERVED 832 STUDENTS WTIH 999 PARTICIPATION DAYS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL'S ENDOWMENTS CONSIST OF APPROXIMATELY 45 INDIVIDUAL FUNDS ESTABLISHED IN PERPETUITY MOSTLY FOR THE BENEFIT OF SCHOLARSHIPS, STAFF DEVELOPMENT AND UNRESTRICTED OPERATING FUNDS. THE PERCENTAGE REPORTED FOR PERMANENT ENDOWMENTS INCLUDES AMOUNTS THAT MUST BE MAINTAINED IN PERPETUITY AS WELL AS ACCUMULATED EARNINGS ON SUCH AMOUNTS THAT HAVE NOT YET BEEN APPROPRIATED FOR EXPENDITURE.

THE SCHOOL IS AN ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND IS CLASSIFIED BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE AS OTHER THAN A PRIVATE FOUNDATION. IT IS THE SCHOOL'S POLICY TO EVALUATE ALL TAX POSITIONS TO IDENTIFY ANY THAT MAY BE CONSIDERED UNCERTAIN. ALL IDENTIFIED MATERIAL TAX POSITIONS ARE ASSESSED AND MEASURED BY A MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT THRESHOLD TO DETERMINE IF THE TAX POSITION IS UNCERTAIN, AND WHAT, IF ANY, EFFECT THE UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION MAY HAVE ON THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. NO MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS WERE IDENTIFIED FOR TAX YEARS 2023 OR 2022. CURRENTLY, THE STATUTE OF LIMITATIONS REMAINS OPEN SUBSEQUENT TO AND INCLUDING TAX YEAR 2019; HOWEVER, NO EXAMINATIONS ARE IN PROCESS OR ANTICIPATED. ANY CHANGES IN THE AMOUNT OF A TAX POSITION WILL BE RECOGNIZED IN THE PERIOD THE CHANGE OCCURS.
SCHOLARSHIPS IN THE FORM OF TUITION REDUCTION -823,689.
SCHOLARSHIPS IN THE FORM OF TUITION REDUCTION 823,689.

THE NORTH CAROLINA OUTWARD BOUND SCHOOL ("NCOBS") RACIALLY NON-DISCRIMINATORY POLICY IS PUBLISHED IN NUMEROUS LOCATIONS, WHICH INCLUDES THE NCOBS WEBSITE, OFFICIAL NCOBS SOCIAL MEDIA, THE NCOBS ANNUAL REPORT, AND IN NCOBS BROCHURES.
AMOUNTS REPORTED IN PART I ARE BASED ON THE ACCRUAL METHOD OF ACCOUNTING.

THE SCHOOL HAS A SCHOLARSHIP COMMITTEE THAT DETERMINES HOW MUCH CAN BE GRANTED TO EACH SCHOLARSHIP APPLICANT. ONCE APPROVED, THE FUNDS ARE APPLIED DIRECTLY TO THE COURSE REVENUE FOR EACH SCHOLARSHIP GRANTED. BECAUSE THE SCHOLARSHIP IS IN THE FORM OF A REDUCTION OF TUITION CHARGED, THERE IS NO NEED TO MONITOR THE USE OF THE FUNDS ONCE THEY HAVE BEEN GRANTED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CFO AND THE AUDIT COMMITTEE REVIEW THE RETURN PRIOR TO PROVIDING A COPY TO THE BOARD AND FILING WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION REGULARLY AND CONSISTENTLY MONITORS AND ENFORCES COMPLIANCE WITH THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY BY REQUIRING BOARD MEMBERS AND MANAGEMENT EMPLOYEES TO SIGN AND TURN IN A COPY OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ANNUALLY. ALSO, ANY PAYMENTS OR REIMBURSEMENTS MADE TO BOARD MEMBERS AND MANAGERS ARE MONITORED TO BE SURE THEY ARE LEGITIMATE, UNBIASED, AND FREE FROM POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD AND KEY EMPLOYEES AND TOP MANAGEMENT COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NC OUTWARD BOUND SCHOOL MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC IN ITS HANDBOOK AND UPON REQUEST BY THE PUBLIC.
